text:
Wow...!
That's a really big tree...!
The star on top is sparkling so brightly.

Hehe, it sure is!
At that distance... it must be quite large, don't you think?

Think about it.
Things far away tend to look smaller, right?

But that star,
looks so big and sparkling...
Does that mean it's really, really big!?

Yes!
So surely, holding up that star must be quite a task.
It might be as big as us, maybe.

Wow...!
I wish we could see the part where they put it on top...
